body:
This issue is to track the various features added to the concretizer in ASP recently to ensure the z3 version contains the same features. This is a subset of the "concretizer" label in the list of spack PRs. We hope/expect that it will be possible to accomplish this in fewer changes than needed for the ASP concretizer, simply because we know what we will need to build beforehand somewhat.

- [ ] #19501
    - #20503 is intended to produce a concretizer which is somewhat close to the abilities of the original python concretizer, so it would likely correspond to #19501 here.
- [ ] #19988 
- [ ] #20020 
- [ ] #20082 
- [ ] #20086 
- [ ] #20099 
- [ ] #20102

title: implement concretizer features with z3
